preqs: One of ATS1312, ATS1898, ATS1251, HPL1504 or permission

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS2566, GSC2506, HPL2506}

For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {GSC15%, HPL15%, HSY1%, INT1010, INT1020, PLT1%} OR  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1251, ATS1312, ATS1898, HPL1504}) Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1251, ATS1312, ATS1898, HPL1504}

description: This unit focuses on local and community history, and investigates concepts of community, the relationship between people and place and the connection between past and present. Students will study methods of historical research including oral history, photographic interpretation and material culture. Through the assignments that include designing an exhibition panel and undertaking a community history research project, students will acquire the skills of writing for a community audience.
